Question.Subject: plz sites like u tube and google vids!!!?
Question.Content: leagal,free,not utube or google videos,quite well known and has lots of people visits!!!(and as i said make sure its leagal)
Question.ChosenAnswer:
You gotta be kidding? 1,890,000,000 videos on YouTube aren't enough for you?
Perhaps you need to learn how to use it: type a subject in the search box at http://www.youtube.com & click the Search button.
Or go here for lots of ideas & help: http://www.google.com/support/youtube/
...

Answer.Content:
Here are some leagal video sharing sites with lots of people visits!!!
http://video.myspace.com http://www.metacafe.com http://www.dailymotion.com http://www.hulu.com http://video.yahoo.com http://www.veoh.com http://video.aol.com http://www.blinkx.com
You know, there is this *GREAT* tool called The Google, you should try it some time. http://www.google.com
